entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then partly cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
